name: BicepWhatIfReport
description: Generates a markdown formatted report of the JSON output of the Bicep What If command to provide a friendly, human-readable report.
author: Weekendclimber

inputs.name: bicepWhatIfJSONPath
inputs.label: Bicep What If JSON file(s) path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the path of where the Bicep What If command output the JSON files. The files should contain the results of the Bicep What If operation.
